snippet: Returning from Latin America, the pope described a sharpening divide between rich and poor, but he admitted to speaking about the middle class only “in passing.”
abstract: Pope Francis, speaking to reporters aboard papal jet on return from Latin American visit, admits to having omitted mention of middle class in his focus on growing global income inequality and says he must give thought to matter; answers other questions regarding trip.
lead_paragraph: Returning from Latin America, the pope described a sharpening divide between rich and poor, but he admitted to speaking about the middle class only “in passing.”

headline.main: Pope Francis Says He’s Overlooked the World’s Middle Class
headline.print_headline: In His Focus on Rich and Poor, Pope Admits to Overlooking the Middle Class
